TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Gukut, title = Gukut, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gukut} }

S.FORM: Gukut Itiniay i Xiulin Cen no Hualien ko Gukut a niyaro', 174 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 543 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 508 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 35 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Truku 83%, Amis 3%, Tayal 4%, Paiwan 2%, roma 3%.

Gokot Itiniay i Xiolin Cen no Hoalien ko Gokot a niyaro', 174 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 543 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 508 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 35 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Troko 83%, Amis 3%, Tayal 4%, Paiwan 2%, roma 3%.
